attributes.action: Give children who are in full time education under the age of 16 to have free transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All children who are under the age of sixteen should have free transport. In cities such as Manchester children do get free transport. But in sum cities this isn't the same. The reason the child should be in full time education is beacuse they might take advantage out of it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
